New node checklist:
- [ ] install system packages
- [ ] install nodejs 16.20.2
- [ ] setup local network
- [ ] setup redis 
- [ ] setup github Runner
- [ ] add users 
- [ ] clone repo
- [ ] clone libs 
- [ ] add configs
- [ ] install npm packages
- [ ] run node
- [ ] add dns records
- [ ] prometheus config
- [ ] add to deploy
- [ ] add to zabbix
